example.name: ladylike
example.text: ``Get your feet off the table!'' Mary roared at John.

example.name: lions have only one arg
example.text: John heard the lion roar, but chose to ignore it.

example.name: roaring twenties?
example.text: As the book begins, a newly wed Marlowe roars into the desert resort of Poodle (a.k.a. Palm) Springs at the wheel of a Cadillac Fleetwood.
